commit_summary:
# Commits overview

On 2025-11-18 (local time), the repository saw a series of commits primarily focused on file management and initial setup. The activity included adding and renaming files, content updates, and cleanup tasks. There was also a merge of a feature branch related to testing pull requests.

# Work by contributor

### ALaa Erfan
- Performed core file operations including adding a new file (`hello.txt`), updating its content, and renaming it to `hello-test.txt`.
- Cleaned up the repository by deleting an empty file named `delete-file`.
- These changes reflect basic content management and repository hygiene improvements.

### AlaaErfan
- Made the initial commit to set up the repository.
- Created a feature branch for testing pull requests, which was later merged.
- Focused on establishing the initial codebase and validating PR workflows.
